reviews.review:
Grauenhafter Support

Hallo Freunde, ich mag Dead by Daylight wirklich sehr weil es viele gute Ideen hat. Allerdings bin ich mehr als frustriert und sauer, da durch einen beschissenen Bug meine gesamten Spielstände auf Level 0 gesetzt wurden. Laut den Entwicklern kann man sich per E-Mail mit Ihnen zwar in Kontekt setzen, auf antworten kann man aber vergeblich warten. Lediglich die automatische Antwort wird einem geschickt. Somit warte ich seit dem 19.12. auf eine Antwort und Bearbeitung meines Problems. Es macht sich meiner Meinung nach keiner die Mühe etwas zu unternehmen. In manchen Forums beklagen viele andere Spieler das selbige Problem. Alle Spielstunden umsonst gesuchtet.
黎明杀机这个游戏我玩了400多个小时第一次写评测，虽然这个游戏充满了bug，还在一直出现新的bug，但是还是真的能够玩下去，有时候正是因为这些bug游戏才充满乐趣，希望以后会认识更多的小伙伴

Новых режимов как не было, так и нету сейчас. Многое нерфят, многое апают, от чего баланс всегда болтается на качелях. Иногда в новых главах добавляют такой лютый треш что хочется бросить игру, но я всё равно люблю её)
Luuuv

Este juego es muy entretenido y tiene mucho puntos a favor, pero también tiene otros de malos.
A favor:
- Gran variedad de personajes a elegir.
- Hay muchísimos mapas.
- Buenos gráficos.
- Se puede jugar con amigos.
- Se puede subir de nivel a los personajes a través de la red de sangre.
- Las partidas son emocionantes y te ponen muy tenso.

En contra:
- Hay bastantes bugs.
- A veces cuesta encontrar partida.
- De vez en cuando te encuentras algun campero.

Payed Season passes
Cosmetics locked behind pay walls
Poor developer support

Developers have become more and more greedy by locking cosmetics behind pay walls. I've tolerated a lot of their pay walls and left my score as a thumbs up until they have recently announced payed season passes.
I've logged 450+ hours in this game and purchased every DLC but one to date. So giving it a negative rating falls on me with a heavy heart, but the developers are more interested in pumping out DLC and season passes to milk their player base rather than fix glaring issues with the game.
虽然这么多bug，可是还是带给我了很多乐趣、

Its a good game, but has a lot of bugs. One time, I was put into the ready screen right away, then the load screens took like 5 minutes and when I got in the game, there was only two victums and the killer. Wait till the game gets fixed, then buy it. I also thinks it needs more dlc. The Halloween one is cool, but there need to be more characters coming very soon. Over all, I think its a good game, but it needs work.

Finally was able to change this review after god knows how long, the developers finally managed to imrpove their game which I am proud of. They finally gave survivors a chance to escape by removing the auto aim given to killers along with generators being repaired quicker

Secondly Killers may now damage generators to halt the progress on generators making games a little bit longer and allowing everyone to gain more points. Overall the game is now balanced for both sides instead of being killer balanced.  Finding matches no longer takes years to accomplish which is great.

They also have recenetly upgraded their engine to make the game look better, colors are much more darker and sleaker along with the sky looking incredibly beter.

well looks like we have survivors running around with 4 of the same perks and chainsaw but don't worry if you are a famous streamer youll only get a one day ban, pathetic, and the devs are ignoring the fact this is a game breaking bug and ain't doing nothing. i do not recommend this game at this time will change later if i feel like its in a good state, don't get me wrong i love this game and i wish this game will get passed these silly bugs and become a awesome horror game

So Precisa Arrumar Os Bugs

So l'll start off by saying l like this game, it's creative, the gameplay is fun, though frustrating at times. 
The reason I do not recomment this game for the time being is because the server issues in the game are unreal. 2/3 Survivior Mode doesn't even work and the game tries to load you into a non-existant lobby which forces you to restart or you'll be stuck in an infinite loading screen. Whenever you actually do get in a game, 9/10 times at least 1 person disconnects. 
Another huge problem for me is the loading screens, whenever you do join a game 1/4 you get disconnected even as killer but mostly 2-ish players disconnect and you're stuck in a seemingly never ending loading screen of times up to 15 minutes.
Fix the game and it'll be fun as all get out.

The game is great except it's so buggy when trying to find games. It takes WAY too long to get into one, and this is an issue that's plagued the game since it's release. It actually has been getting worse as it was at least bearable before. Unfortunately, as others have mentioned, the devs seem more interested in releasing new outfits than actually fixing bugs that forces you to restart constantly.

Not very good if you're looking for a fair game, and that could change with future updates. Killers are much more likely to kill all survivors than all survivors are to escape. It is very good with environment, making survivors feel true dread and turning killers into real monsters. This is probably going to be the most fun with your own friends. I could stand to see different objectives for either side (navigate a maze of catacombs instead of fixing generators, or only kill one survivor in a much more complicated, easy to disrupt ritual). That all said, I haven't seen any other game do 4 survivors vs 1 killer better. This is the biggest step from a cool idea to a fun game I've seen in this area.

Would really love this beta/early access to end, so that we can have some dedicated servers and not have to deal with the connection of the killer. It really makes the game lose its joy and fun when I go against and don't even know where I am running because of the lag spikes that occur that change my position dramatically. Oh wait a second this is full release. 

These are problems that should have already be solved. Instead of making new characters and dlc to add to the game why don't you get it to a stable point first, so everyone can enjoy it. I would also recommend announcing that you go that route just so that we know that is what you are doing. It will really help everyone if you keep us informed and tell us that you go this route that would be awesome. I love this game, but hate seeing it in the state it is in. Please take your time to fix it. The community will understand if you tell us, but if you act like nothing is wrong and there are only minor bugs to work out just look at half of the negative to see that there are plenty of people having as rough time with what is going on. For me it hasn't been to much, but I have seen my friends have problems like rank reset happening mid season.

I would recommend this game when things are fixed, but honestly right now I can not recommend it to anyone else until the problems are fixed. (Btw dedicated servers would be nice.) Also, I played a match while in the middle of writting this and the Nurse after she telported and downed me looked like she was stuck in that position and then magically got out of it. It really confused me and the rest of my group. Also, during that same match the killer picked up the person as he escaped and was able to hook him and get the credit as a kill, but the person still escaped. It is very ironic that the game had those weird problems as I was writting this, but they gave me more to say in what is wrong with the game currently.

Thanks for your time,
A worried player

Nice
Game is dark, creepy, and super intense. It's pule pounding from the get go. It's balanced between survivors and killers making for a truely enjoyable experience win or lose.

Ach ja, Dead by Daylight. Es bereitet mir immer noch sehr sehr viel spaß. 
Nur es trifft nicht jeden Geschmack, das hab ich bereits gemerkt. 

Anfangs hatte ich mich meistens richtig vor dem 'Killer' erschrocken, das geht nun einigermaßen. 
Bis der Michael hinter einem steht, der beschert mir immer noch einen Schrei. 

Die Entwickler geben sich wirklich Mühe den Spieler an das Game zu fesseln. 
Mit Wochenenden wo es Doppelt Blutpunkte gibt, zu Weihnachten etwas Schnee. Coole Klamotten für den Charaktere, neue Updates wo Charaktere & Killer reinkommen, um uns Spielern immer und immer wieder zu fesseln.

Sehr einfaches Spielprinzip: Generatoren zum laufen bringen, ohne sich erwischen zu lassen. Wird man erwischt, gelangt man an den Haken, dort müssen die drei anderen Teammitglieder versuchen einen zu retten. Doch häufig wird man vom Killer gecampt, so dass es unmöglich ist vom Haken geholt zu werden.

An sich ein tolles Spiel, nur sollten ein paar Bugs behoben werden ;) 
Das Geld lohnt sich aufjedenfall für das Spiel! 
Hoffe auf weitere spaßige Spielstunden :)
id say this definitely is a video game

Al livello di gameplay è riuscito perfettamente, anche la grafica non è male, ma la cosa che mi fa arrabbiare di più è che gli sviluppatori se ne fregano degli immensi bug, sia di gioco che di interfaccia. Dovrebbero pensare più a queste cose che aggiungere nuovi killer che poi si dovranno pure fixare. good

Game has a good idea and concept. But the killers are so overpowered suvivors get nerfed to the ground and they need to take care of hook camping. This is where a killer gets u down puts u on the hood then sits there so no one can rescue you. The Devs need to do something about this. Also if your on the shoulder of a killer and they droped down stairs that should be a free get away.

I like Dead By Daylight. I really do. The concept is awesome. I basically consider it like a "hide and seek" type game where one person is the killer and 4 others are the survivors. The adrenaline always gets kicking when the sound of the heartbeat or music starts kicking into high gear letting me know the killer is some where near. I really really want to recommend this game, however, its some what broken. I have almost 10 hours of game play so far and I would guess maybe 3 and a half to 4 of those hours are spent at the loading screen. I've currently run into the issue where playing a survivor will freeze my game up, and I run a pretty decent PC. 

PROS:
-Great Concept.
-Suspensful game play.
-Really nailed the "horror movie feel".
-Some killer/survivor customization.

CONS:
-Horrible matchmaking.
-Game breaking Bugs/Glitches.

Purely amazing. Yes, it isn't perfect, still has a lot of glitches, bugs and exploits...they don't ruin the experience though. Not even close. 10/10

While a great concept, and fun when you get good matchmaking, the matchmaking system is very poor. In the lower ranks, the killer is heavily favored to win, and at the upper levels of play the survivors are favored, a flawed model of balance in my opinion.

New players and experienced players get regularly lumped in together. Pitting four experienced survivors with maxed ultra rare perks versus a perkless killer turns the match into a waste of all the player's time, as large amounts of points are best earned when both sides have to work hard for victory.

This game is also very unfriendly to new players. Be expected to put in 50+ hours just to get the basic perks for good play.

Only play this game if you can slog through dozens of hours of defeat before you can accumulate enough bloodpoints to rank up and start winning.

Alright second review time... I have played this game since it first came to steam and have loved it ever since. The feeling of being chased and laughing with your friends is a great mix. Also playing the killer and having a sense of power is amazing but, there are issues imo. They care more about the killers and cosmetics a lot more then gameplay and the survivors. They are doing an okay job at patching and balancing but, there are so many perks that are not usable because they are useless or the wraith because he is terrible in this meta. If i were to buy this game it would not have been at the price I did 10$ is a great price and a great game to play with friends or alone... You choose whether you like my opinion or not but this is how i feel. Also 72hrs come back...

Amo l'idea, mi sono innamorata dello stile di gioco e l'ho comprato appena ne ho avuto la possibilità... solo per trovare un'enorme delusione.
L'"idea" alla fine si è rivelata quella utopica di poter giocare, viste le infinite lobby quando si tenta di entrare in più di una persona. Da soli, poi, per carità... sono più le volte che passo a fissare la schermata iniziale buggata e il tipico errore "impossibile entrare in lobby" che non dentro al gioco stesso.
Non ho moltissime ore giocate, ma posso affermare con tranquillità che metà di quelle sono state passate in attese interminabili e inconcludenti. 
Ho giocato poco, il gioco in sé è molto bello ma la quantità di bug è davvero inaccettabile. Sono cose che si leggono in ogni recensione, purtroppo non è davvero qualcosa che posso sopportare.

upd: Обзор изменен с отрицательного на положительный.

Это все еще не идеальная игра, но разработчики не забрасывают её.

Да, баланс здесь посредственный (но это вполне естественно для игр, где много завязано на абилки при достаточном их выборе).
Да, еще могут встречаться баги.
Но я вижу прогресс, а потому меняю оценку на положительную, удаляя старый текст.

p.s. Но рейтинговую систему, где рейтинг просто фармится, я все еще считаю почти бессмысленой.

You appear, surrounded in smog and the light of the moon. You and 3 other survivors must revive the now so quiet generators. But you and all of your fellow survivors suck and make explosions on these generators which lead the monster (daddy), to you and now you are all the boys next door, you are all in daddy town. Besides the que times this is a very fun game to play with your friends and by yourself. With the stress and risk/reward of this game every move must be strategical and it is quite intense to say the least. I definetly would recommend to anyone looking for a good horrorish strategy game. 10/10
